src.display.get_name_players(nb_players, window, butt_page_nom_player, rect_page_nom_player) → tuple[bool, list][source]

This function gets the type and the name of each player who wants to play

Parameters

  • nb_players –

  • window –

  • butt_page_nom_player –

  • rect_page_nom_player –

Return players

it’s a list of list, in which element there is the type of the player (0:human,1:ia) and if it’s an

human there is also is name (a string)
